question: Which country houses "Guiana Amazonian Park"?
explanation: Guiana Amazonian Park is an IUCN Category II national park located in French Guiana, the overseas region of France located in South America. It is the largest national park of France which aims at protecting part of the Amazonian forest located in French Guiana. It is the largest park in France, in the European Union, and one of the largest national parks in the world.
